snippet.title: Retro-Pixel Castles InDev 17 Trailer
snippet.description:
Buy the game on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/328080/
Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/RaymondDoerr
Visit the Official Website: http://retropixelcastles.com

A hybrid Godlike Village Simulator Roguelike inspired by games like Towns, Gnomoria, Banished and Dwarf Fortress. Grow and manage an expanding village while trying to fight off hordes of monsters until you're inevitable death! Constantly updated, enjoyed my many, and still in heavy development.
